244378.「止まれ！\n このような場に なんの用だ。: Hold it! What are you doing here?

244379.<cs_pchero>は ミルフィからのメッセージを\nルベンという人物に 届け:
<cs_pchero> informed him that they came
to deliver a message from Mirfi to someone
named Reuben.

244380.「ミルフィからか……私が ルベンだ。\n よし 話を聞こう。こちらに来てくれ。:
From Mirfi... I'm Reuben. All right, let me
hear what she has to say. Come closer.

244381.「フフフ。身動きは おろか 声も出せないだろ。\n さっそくだが キミの相棒は:
Hmhmhm. You can't move, let alone make any
noise. Now then, where's your little partner?
Nelim, I think their name was...

244382.「おや？ 事態を のみ込めていない？: Oh? You don't understand what's going on?

244383.<pipipi_high>「おお！ どうか 愛しのルベンに\n 私の死を 伝えて:
<pipipi_high>"Oh! Please tell my beloved Reuben of my
death..." Heheheh.

244384.「あの依頼人のミルフィは 私だよ。\n シロートにしては 迫真の演技だったろ？:
That client Mirfi was me. Quite a convincing
performance for a novice like you, wasn't it?

244385.「最初に名乗った ルベンというのも 偽名でね。\n 本当の名は ギスマイヤーとい:
Even the name Reuben was fake. My real name is
Gismeyer. One can never be too careful.

244386.「さてと……用があるのは ネリム君のほうでね。\n 一緒だと 思い込んでいたが…:
Now then... Nelim was the one I wanted to see.
I thought she'd be with you... Oh well, if
she's not here, I'll just use you as bait.

244388.「えへへ～ 気になって 追ってきちゃった。\n ルベンさんて この人かな？:
Ehehe～, I got curious and followed you. Is
this that Reuben person you were looking for?

244389.「そうだよ。キミが ネリム君だね。\n じつに いいタイミングだ。\n キミに:
That's right. You must be Nelim. Very good
timing. I have a favor to ask you.

244390.「この本はね 死霊の書と呼ばれる\n 特別な書物だ。しかも 由緒ある血筋の者……:
This is a special book called the Book of the
Dead. It can only be opened by those of a
certain lineage... the book's heir.

244391.「かねてから 継承者を見つけだそうと\n デスマスターが 近寄りそうな場所に\n:
For some time now, I've been placing detection
spells at places where Death Masters might
show up in order to find this heir...

244392.「それで つい先日 発見に至ったのだが\n 継承者のキミが デスマスターでなかっ:
And only recently, I made the discovery that
you, the book's heir, weren't even a Death
Master! No wonder it took so long to find you!

244393.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。なんか ヤバそうだし\n 用がすんでるなら 早い:
Hey, <cs_pchero>. I've got a bad feeling
about this. If you're done here, then let's
head back.

244394.<if_woman>「おっと <cs_pchero>君が 帰れるかどうかは\n:
<if_woman>Oh, whether or not <cs_pchero> can
leave is up to you. Unseal the Book of the
Dead. Then I will set her free.<else>Oh, whether or not <cs_pchero> can
leave is up to you. Unseal the Book of the
Dead. Then I will set him free.<endif>

244395.「はぁ？ なに言ってくれてんの アンタ。\n アタシを おどしてんの？:
Huh? What are you talking about? Are you
trying to scare me?

244396.「まあまあ。そう 怖いカオ しなさんなって。\n カンタンなことさ。ただ この本:
Now, now. No need to make such a scary face.
It's simple. All you have to do is open this
book.

244397.「封印してあるってことはさ……コレ\n かなり ヤバイ本なんじゃないの？\n 協:
If the book is sealed, doesn't that mean it's
a really bad book? There's no way I can go
along with this.

244398.「<cs_pchero>君の生死が かかっていてもかい？: Even if <cs_pchero>'s life is at stake?

244399.「あー もうッ！ わかったよ。\n アタシが こいつを ひらくと同時に\n アン:
Geez, fine! I get it. As soon as I open this
book, you better let <cs_pchero> go!

244400.「おお！ やった！ やったぞ！！\n 何人たりとも ひらけなかった 死霊の書が\:
Ohh! It's done! It's finally done! The Book of
the Dead, which no one had been able to
unseal, has been opened.

244401.「残念だよ ネリム君。死霊の書は\n ひらこうとする者の命を 奪うというが\n:
Too bad, Nelim. They say that the Book of the Dead will take the life of anyone who tries to open it, but I'm surprised that it also
applies to the book's heir...

244402.「だがね 私の好みで言えば 生きてるキミより\n 死んでるキミのほうが 断然 美:
But you know... for my tastes, you're more
beautiful dead than alive.

244403.「ゾクゾクするよ！ 狂おしいほどにッ！: I've got shivers! It's driving me wild!

244404.「ひとつの死体だけでも こんなにも\n 美しいのだから 何百何千という死体に\n:
One corpse alone is beautiful, but if I were
surrounded by hundreds or thousands of
corpses... hmhmhm, aha!

244405.「現実味のない話に 聞こえるかな……。\n この 死霊の書さえあれば 死者の王国:
I don't mean to exaggerate, but with the Book
of the Dead, it's entirely possible to create
an entire kingdom of the dead.

244406.「うたがっているのかい？\n なら ひとつ 実演してみせよう。:
Think I'm lying? Then allow me to give you a
demonstration.

244407.「現世にうごめく 怨霊よ！ 亡者の魂よ！\n この地に埋もれた 死肉に宿り\n:
O grudges that haunt this world! Souls of the
departed! Dwell in the dead flesh buried here,
and rise once more as the living dead!

244408.「<cs_pchero>君 しばしの別れだ。\n 次に会うときは キミを死霊とし:
This is goodbye, <cs_pchero>. The next
time we meet, it will be when I summon you as
my undead servant.

244409.<cs_pchero>は ネリムの なきがらを抱えて\nデズリンの待つ家に 戻っ:
<cs_pchero> returned to Deathlin's house
with Nelim's motionless body...

244410.「どうしたの <cs_pchero>さん！？\n ネリムちゃんは……ま まさか…:
What happened, <cs_pchero>!? Nelim is...
N, no...

244411.「ああ……わたくしが この子を\n 行かせてしまった ばっかりに……: ...It's all my fault for letting her go...

244412.「<cs_pchero>さん 何があったか\n 話してくださいますね？:
<cs_pchero>, will you please tell me what
happened?

244413.「い…依頼者が ギスマイヤーだったなんて……\n あの者は 死霊の書の 封印を解:
I can't believe that request was from
Gismeyer... he's been searching for the Book
of the Dead's heir in order to break its seal.

244414.「怨霊を 死肉に宿らせる 禁忌の書。\n 記したのは ネリムちゃんの遠い祖先です:
It's a forbidden book that forces vengeful spirits to inhabit the bodies of the dead. It was written by Nelim's ancestor, making her
its heir.

244415.「書は 代々 継承されていったのですが\n どこかの時点で 盗難にあい……\n:
The book was passed down from generation to
generation, but at some point it was stolen...
and it ended up in Gismeyer's hands.

244416.「わたくしの家系は 継承者を守りつつ\n 紛失した書を探す役目を になっていまし:
My family was tasked with finding the lost
book while also protecting its heirs.

244417.「しかし 一族は衰え わたくしの先々代で\n すでに 継承者の家系は デスマスタ:
However, the family lineage was in decline,
and by my generation, our family had abandoned
the way of the Death Master.

244418.「かわいそうな ネリムちゃん……この子は\n 偉大なる祖先のことも 死霊の書のこ:
Poor Nelim... this child was killed without
ever knowing a single thing about her great
ancestors or the Book of the Dead.

244421.「……ひとつ 腑に落ちなかったのは\n 継承者であるはずのネリムちゃんが 死霊の:
...Something that didn't make sense to me was
that Nelim, who was supposed to be the heir,
collapsed after opening the book...

244422.「著者は 悪用を恐れ 継承者以外の者が\n 書を ひらこうとすれば 絶命する呪法:
It was said that the book's author was so afraid of it being misused, that they placed a curse that would kill anyone that opened it,
except for its proper heirs.

244423.「ネリムちゃんは 継承者ではあるけれど\n デスマスターではない。この 中途半端:
Nelim is the heir, but she is not a Death
Master. This halfway state may be the cause of
her coma...

244424.「いったん わたくしのほうで ネリムちゃんを\n 覚醒させる手段を 探してみます: I will try to find a way to awaken Nelim.

244425.「それと……こちらは 危険な事態に\n 巻き込んでしまったことへの お詫びを込め:
Also... this is my way of apologizing for
putting you in harm's way. Please accept it.

244426.「ネリムちゃんを救う方法が 見つかったら\n そのときは ぜひ 協力してください:
If I find a way to save Nelim, please lend us
your aid.
